Matthew:

Age: Ten

Grade: Fifth

Favorite courses: tae kwon do, math, science

Courses with most improvement: reading and writing

Favorite foods: Chinese food, Japanese food, steak

Favorite colors: blue, red, green, black

Favorite things to do: biking, roller skating, scootering, game boy

Least favorite things to do: fishing, losing, running

Goals: go to Harvard, become an author/illustrator, become an engineer

What I am like: I am logical, determined and tend to be serious though I can be silly too. I am not too introverted but right on the introverted/extroverted border. I like
anything with wheels.
